info.name: Faded Last.fm
info.description: A faded and darker theme for Last.fm.
info.additionalInfo:
2019-08-03: Updated the artist and song pages to remove the white blocks. Thanks for the feedback!

2019-04-21: All pages updated.Let me know in the discussions if you have any issues.
-----ToDo---- Update images

2019-04-19: Several changes to profile page. Home and live page updated.

2019-04-18: Initial release. Main profile page done. No alternative images yet.

data.title: good work, still missing a couple empty white spots on artists pages
An update would be excellent! (Reflecting recent last.fm page re-design). Cheers.
